description: No strangers to isolation, the trio left for the space station months before Covid-19 emerged.
title: Coronavirus: Space crew return to very different Earth
title_page: Coronavirus: Space crew return to very different Earth - BBC News
maintext: "It's quite surreal to see it unfolding on Earth below," Ms Meir told reporters during a recent video call. "From here, Earth looks just as stunning as usual, so it's hard to believe all of the changes that have taken place since we left."
